function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assumption of local travel ban accompanying home isolation policies","Impact":"Unintended travel leading to spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Clarify and confirm local travel ban policies for all localities with home isolation policies","Technologies":"Data analytics and automated policy tracking systems","People":"Residents under home isolation, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments"},{"Description":"Assumption of accompanying policies for home isolation in different countries","Impact":"Inconsistent and ineffective measures for disease control and prevention","Mitigation":"Clarify and standardize the accompanying policies for home isolation across different countries","Technologies":"International policy coordination platforms, diplomatic negotiations","People":"Global population, travelers","Owner":"International health organizations, diplomatic organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate or incomplete epidemiological data","Impact":"Misleading analysis and decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement quality-control measures for data collection and reporting, ensure transparency in data sources","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance systems, data validation algorithms","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"}]}
